016package de.cuioss.test.jsf.config.decorator;
017
018import de.cuioss.test.jsf.mocks.CuiMockHttpServletRequest;
019import jakarta.faces.component.UIViewRoot;
020import jakarta.faces.context.ExternalContext;
021import jakarta.faces.context.FacesContext;
022import jakarta.servlet.http.Cookie;
023import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
024import lombok.RequiredArgsConstructor;
025import org.apache.myfaces.test.mock.MockExternalContext;
026import org.apache.myfaces.test.mock.MockFacesContext;
027import org.apache.myfaces.test.mock.MockHttpServletRequest;
028
029import java.io.Serializable;
030import java.util.Arrays;
031import java.util.List;
032import java.util.Locale;
033
034/**
035 * Helper class for configuring the request
036 *
037 * @author Oliver Wolff
038 */
039@RequiredArgsConstructor
040public class RequestConfigDecorator {
041
042    private final MockFacesContext facesContext;
043    private final MockExternalContext externalContext;
044
045    /**
046     * Sets the postback attribute to {@link FacesContext#isPostback()}
047     *
048     * @param postback to be set
049     * @return the {@link RequestConfigDecorator} itself in order to enable a
050     * fluent-api style usage
051     */
052    public RequestConfigDecorator setPostback(final boolean postback) {
053        facesContext.setPostback(postback);
054        return this;
055    }
056
057    /**
058     * Sets the viewId in {@link UIViewRoot}
059     *
060     * @param viewId to be set
061     * @return the {@link RequestConfigDecorator} itself to enable a
062     * fluent-api style usage
063     */
064    public RequestConfigDecorator setViewId(final String viewId) {
065        facesContext.getViewRoot().setViewId(viewId);
066        return this;
067    }
068
069    /**
070     * Registers a concrete RequestHeader to
071     * {@link ExternalContext#getRequestHeaderMap()}
072     *
073     * @param key   used as the key for the
074     *              {@link ExternalContext#getRequestHeaderMap()}
075     * @param value used as the value for the
076     *              {@link ExternalContext#getRequestHeaderMap()}
077     * @return the {@link RequestConfigDecorator} itself in order to enable a
078     * fluent-api style usage
079     */
080    public RequestConfigDecorator setRequestHeader(final String key, final String value) {
081        externalContext.addRequestHeader(key, value);
082        return this;
083    }
084
085    /**
086     * Registers a concrete Request-parameter to
087     * {@link ExternalContext#getRequestParameterMap()}
088     *
089     * @param key   used as the key for the
090     *              {@link ExternalContext#getRequestHeaderMap()}
091     * @param value used as the value for the
092     *              {@link ExternalContext#getRequestHeaderMap()}
093     * @return the {@link RequestConfigDecorator} itself in order to enable a
094     * fluent-api style usage
095     */
096    public RequestConfigDecorator setRequestParameter(final String key, final String value) {
097        externalContext.addRequestParameterMap(key, value);
098        return this;
099    }
100
101    /**
102     * Registers a concrete Request-attribute to
103     * {@link HttpServletRequest#setAttribute(String, Object)}
104     *
105     * @param key   used as the key for the
106     *              {@link HttpServletRequest#setAttribute(String, Object)}
107     * @param value used as the value for the
108     *              {@link HttpServletRequest#setAttribute(String, Object)}
109     * @return the {@link RequestConfigDecorator} itself in order to enable a
110     * fluent-api style usage
111     */
112    public RequestConfigDecorator setRequestAttribute(final String key, final Serializable value) {
113        ((HttpServletRequest) externalContext.getRequest()).setAttribute(key, value);
114        return this;
115    }
116
117    /**
118     * Registers one or more cookies the the contained request
119     *
120     * @param cookie to be added
121     * @return the {@link RequestConfigDecorator} itself in order to enable a
122     * fluent-api style usage
123     */
124    public RequestConfigDecorator addRequestCookie(final Cookie... cookie) {
125        var request = (MockHttpServletRequest) externalContext.getRequest();
126        for (Cookie aCookie : cookie) {
127            request.addCookie(aCookie);
128        }
129        return this;
130    }
131
132    /**
133     * <p>
134     * Registers one or more requestLocale to
135     * {@link ExternalContext#getRequestLocales()}. It can be used for resetting the
136     * locales as well.
137     * </p>
138     * <em>Caution: </em> It expects the {@link HttpServletRequest} being an
139     * instance of {@link CuiMockHttpServletRequest}
140     *
141     * @param requestLocale one or more requestLocales to be set
142     * @return the {@link RequestConfigDecorator} itself in order to enable a
143     * fluent-api style usage
144     */
145    public RequestConfigDecorator setRequestLocale(final Locale... requestLocale) {
146        var request = (CuiMockHttpServletRequest) externalContext.getRequest();
147        List<Locale> localeList = Arrays.asList(requestLocale);
148        Locale locale = null;
149        if (!localeList.isEmpty()) {
150            locale = localeList.iterator().next();
151        }
152        request.setLocale(locale);
153        request.setRequestLocales(localeList);
154        return this;
155    }
156
157    /**
158     * Explicitly sets a given queryString as path-element of the request
159     *
160     * @param parameterString
161     */
162    public void setQueryString(String parameterString) {
163        var request = (CuiMockHttpServletRequest) externalContext.getRequest();
164        request.setPathElements(request.getContextPath(), request.getServletPath(), request.getPathInfo(),
165            parameterString);
166    }
167}
